results.title: Stripped
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Dinky
results.brief_description: Emotional put-downs can wreak havoc on you as a person, stripping you of your independence, confidence, your mind, dignity and self-respect. It takes a long time to recover and rebuild your life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Dinky

results.title: If you are not part of the solution...you are part of the problem
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Libby Lloyd
results.brief_description: Violence against women is possibly the most important, least examined and most taboo subject in our society. This film explores the beginnings of White Ribbon Day and the campaign to making it an important high profile public awareness day in Australia.
results.title_for_label: If you are not part of the solution…you are part of the problem
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Libby Lloyd
results.description: Violence against women is possibly the most important, least examined and most taboo subject in our society. This film explores the beginnings of White Ribbon Day and the campaign to making it an important high profile public awareness day in Australia.
description_for_label: Violence against women is possibly the most important, least examined and most taboo subject in our society. This film explores the beginnings of White Ribbon Day and the campaign to making it an important high profile public awareness day in Australia.

results.title: I think it's going to rain today
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Joan Hobson
results.brief_description: The icy winter storm of abuse that a 14 year-old boy can bring upon a family. The unleashing of anger to deliberate acts of violence. Summer will come again but it will just take awhile.
results.title_for_label: I think it’s going to rain today
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Joan Hobson
results.description: The icy winter storm of abuse that a 14 year-old boy can bring upon a family. The unleashing of anger to deliberate acts of violence. Summer will come again but it will just take awhile.

results.title: Finding me
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Joy Chivers
results.brief_description: Through years of domestic violence Joy existed in the silence of the shadows, afraid to cry out, to seek help, to seek support. Broken bones and bruises heal but the emotional scarring lasts a lifetime.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Joy Chivers
results.description: Through years of domestic violence Joy existed in the silence of the shadows, afraid to cry out, to seek help, to seek support. Broken bones and bruises heal but the emotional scarring lasts a lifetime.
description_for_label: Through years of domestic violence Joy existed in the silence of the shadows, afraid to cry out, to seek help, to seek support. Broken bones and bruises heal but the emotional scarring lasts a lifetime.
